titles.title: He brought me into His banqueting house,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He brought me into His banqueting house,
And His banner over me is love. (x3)
His banner over me is love.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am my Beloved's and He is mine
And His banner over me is love. (x3)
His banner over me is love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In Christ there is no condemnation,
And His banner over me is love. (x3)
His banner over me is love.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I'm safe and secure in the Rock of Ages,
And His banner over me is love. (x3)
His banner over me is love.
